heading: Hello
paragraphs: I am Pradeep Singh. I have 10 years of industry experience in Software Architecture, Software Development and Training. I have worked with big technology firms, startups, telecom and e-commerce companies in roles requiring leadership, management, consulting, communication, team work, and technical skills.
I completed my graduation in Computer Science in year 2013 and I have interests in Music, Blogging, IoT, Machine Learning and Blockchain technologies.

I have been conducting training sessions for my employers and clients related to Software Development, Development Methodologies, Latest Trends and Core Programming Concepts.  I am active on most social media sites and I have people from every background in my network.
